changelog.en:
# Test Version T0.9.5

## New
- New update page
- New reboot page
- Set SoC to 0% on trigger

## Fixed
- The temperature profile now decides whether to use the minimum or maximum temperature for current calculation based on the temperature at the highest C-rate.
- Fixed an error in the min/max temperature calculation
- Fixed an issue where importing settings failed if they contained special characters


⚠️ Important: The display must be updated to version ≥ 1.0.5 for this release, otherwise readings will be incorrect!


Firmware mapping:

    Original BSC hardware: firmware_xx_xx.bin
    Lilygo T-CONNECT - Flashing via USB: firmware_tconnect_full_xx_xx.bin
    Lilygo T-CONNECT - Update via OTA: firmware_tconnect_ota_xx_xx.bin
